description: Write a function called `modify_string(s)` that returns the string in uppercase with all spaces removed.
output_specification: Expected output format will be shown.
explanations: For input ['hello world'], output is HELLOWORLD
For input ['python programming'], output is PYTHONPROGRAMMING
For input ['code clash'], output is CODECLASH
For input ['a b c'], output is ABC
notes: Implement the String Modifications problem correctly
Consider edge cases and boundary conditions
Test your solution with various inputs
hints: Start with the base case or simple scenario
Build up to the complete solution step by step
